title: 発見: ChrisDBaldwin/TruthByte - A minimal Zig+WASM game that crowdsources human truth judgments to build better
summary: 新しいプロジェクトを発見: A minimal Zig+WASM game that crowdsources human truth judgments to build better LLM evaluation datasets. Play a fast round of “True or False?” — every answer trains the future. (⭐1 | 🍴0)
content:
A minimal Zig+WASM game that crowdsources human truth judgments to build better LLM evaluation datasets. Play a fast round of “True or False?” — every answer trains the future.

言語: Zig
スター数: 1
フォーク数: 0
